name: Kung Poo Fighter
overview: Kung Poo Fighter game for the Commodore 64, from 2020 Reset 4K Craptastic GameDev Competition. It certainly doesn’t mean crap, although it can! Craptastic can mean ludicrous, bonkers, outrageous, funny, wacky, far out, and silly. The theme simply implies that the compo was just for a bit of fun, not a serious coding competition. Competitors were welcome to make an excellent game to submit for the compo, or games that contain some humor or silliness to fit more with the theme, but they didn’t have to! The competition was limited to 4KB. Yes, any entry submitted could be no more than 4KB when compressed! In this action game you must focus your Shi... and block the bog rolls or get wiped out completely!
